hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
uname -a
# Export all environment variables needed. export CI=true export PULL_NUMBER export PULL_BASE_REF export REPO_NAME export REPO_OWNER export TEST_CRIO=true
# Print env variables in case we need to debug env
export LVM_DEVICE=/dev/sdb
pr_number="${PULL_NUMBER}" pr_branch="PR_${pr_number}"
# get (only) the number of the branch that we are testing branch_release_number=$(echo ${PULL_BASE_REF} | cut -d'-' -f 2) minor_release_number=$(echo "${branch_release_number}" | cut -d. -f2)
export ghprbGhRepository="${REPO_OWNER}/${REPO_NAME}" export GOROOT="/usr/local/go"
export JOBS=1
# Put our go area into the Jenkins job WORKSPACE tree export GOPATH=${WORKSPACE}/go export PATH=${GOPATH}/bin:/usr/local/go/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:${PATH} mkdir -p "${GOPATH}"
git config --global user.email "katacontainersbot@gmail.com" git config --global user.name "Kata Containers Bot"
# CRI-O repository crio_repo="github.com/cri-o/cri-o" # Kata Containers Tests repository tests_repo="github.com/kata-containers/tests"
echo "This Job will test CRI-O changes using Kata Containers runtime." echo "Testing PR number ${pr_number}."
tests_repo_dir="${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}"
# Clone the tests repository mkdir -p $(dirname "${tests_repo_dir}") [ -d "${tests_repo_dir}" ] || git clone "https://${tests_repo}.git" "${tests_repo_dir}"
# Install Go ${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}/.ci/install_go.sh -p
# Clone CRI-O repository go get -d "$crio_repo" || true
# Checkout to the PR commit and rebase with master cd "${GOPATH}/src/${crio_repo}" git fetch origin "pull/${pr_number}/head:${pr_branch}" git checkout "${pr_branch}" git rebase "origin/${PULL_BASE_REF}"
# And show what we rebased on top of to aid debugging git log --oneline master~1..HEAD
# Change the critools version as latest does not work with 1.13 and 1.14. # if [ "$branch_release_number" == "1.13" ] || [ "$branch_release_number" == "1.14" ] || [ "$branch_release_number" == "1.15" ]; then if [ "$minor_release_number" -lt "16" ]; then critools_version="${branch_release_number}.0" cd "${GOPATH}/src/github.com/kata-containers/runtime" # yq --trim=false w -i versions.yaml externals.critools.version "$critools_version" yq w -i versions.yaml externals.critools.version "$critools_version" yq r versions.yaml externals.critools.version fi
# Run kata-containers setup cd "${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}" .ci/setup.sh
sudo -E kata-runtime kata-env
echo "Ensure crio service is stopped before running the tests" if systemctl is-active --quiet crio; then sudo systemctl stop crio fi
cd "${GOPATH}/src/${crio_repo}" git log --oneline master~1..HEAD
cd "${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}" # Execute CRI-O tests using kata-containers runtime echo "CRI-O Version to test:" sudo crio --version crictl --version export RUNTIME=kata-runtime sudo -E PATH=$PATH make crio
echo "Ensure crio service is stopped before running the tests" if systemctl is-active --quiet crio; then sudo systemctl stop crio fi # Execute CRI-O tests using containerd-shim-kata-v2 runtime export RUNTIME=containerd-shim-kata-v2 sudo -E PATH=$PATH make crio
